rss.channel:
Welcome to CtrlReturn Dive into the intersection of music and Python at ctrlreturn.de Berlin's ultimate live coding event. Experience real-time music creation, workshops, and the unique vibes of our vibrant community. Unleash your creativity with Python programming like never before. Join us for a tech-meets-music adventure! http://localhost:4000/ Wed, 15 May 2024 12:22:10 +0200 Wed, 15 May 2024 12:22:10 +0200 Jekyll v4.3.3 CtrlReturn 2024 >> Videos of Workshops

CtrlReturn 2024 Performances

After a successful event, we want to give you and all people interested in a chance to watch the workshops happened that day.
Follow the link to our YouTube channel: Workshops Playlist!

CtrlReturn 2024 Performances

After a successful event, we want to give you and all people interested in a chance to watch most of the performances happening that day.
Follow the link to our YouTube channel: Performance Playlist!
